question: guardians of the galaxy blue guy in prison
vanilla_rag_result: The "blue guy in prison" you are referring to is likely Yondu Udonta, a character from the "Guardians of the Galaxy" franchise. He is a blue-skinned alien who serves as a leader of the Ravagers and has a complex relationship with Peter Quill (Star-Lord). In the films, Yondu is depicted as being imprisoned at various points, and his character undergoes significant development throughout the series. If you have specific questions about Yondu or his storyline, feel free to ask!
